altTitles.ja: 後輩

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/100804060) (Chapter 1)
100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships

title.en: A Middle-aged Man Who Returned From Another World Becomes Unrivaled In The Apocalyptic World

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai kaeri no ossan wa shuumatsu sekai de musou suru

altTitles.ja: 異世界還りのおっさんは終末世界で無双する

description.en:
The stage is set with an unrivaled middle-aged man in a world overflowing with zombies…! 

––It’s been three years since he was first summoned to another world. Having the unique Class of “Samurai”, he defeated the Demon King along with his party of warriors: “Azami”, 38 years old.

When he finally makes it back to Japan, he comes to know that the world is now filled with zombies…?! Realizing that his skills acquired from the Other World remain, he sets out into the city to seek the truth and search for survivors.

From a hardware store to a school, through the city hall and the police station…. Using his magical powers for increased physical strength and strengthening his weapons, slashing through a sea of zombies on a motorcycle, what is it that awaits Azami…?!

altTitles.ja: クイズ! 正義の選択

description.en: New challengers will challenge the popular variety program “Quiz! Choice of Justice” presented by the video distribution service “Justice” tonight! Do you get "5 million yen for entrepreneurship" or lose your "left arm"? Each decision to be tested on unanswered questions.

altTitles.pt-br: Convento de Monstros: Ordem Signiana de Missa

altTitles.la: Conventus Monstrorum: Ordo Signae de Missa

altTitles.en: Monsters' Convent: Signian Order of Missa

description.en: Gags of a Catholic Convent on a Fantasy World.
description.pt-br: Tirinhas sobre um Convento Católico num mundo de fantasia.

title.en: You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!

altTitles.ja: 娘じゃなくて私が好きなの!?
娘じゃなくて私(ママ)が好きなの!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Musume Janakute Mama ga Suki nano!?
Musume ja Nakute Mama ga Suki nano!?
Musume Janakute Watashi (Mama) ga Suki nano!?

altTitles.en: You Like Me (Mama), Not My Daughter!?

altTitles.zh: 喜欢的不是女儿而是我吗？

altTitles.pt-br: Você Gosta É De Mim (Mamãe) E Não Da Minha Filha?!

altTitles.ja: ママ好き

description.en:
“I will take in and raise this child.”

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it.

Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

“Ayako-mama…… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.”

“……You like me (mama), not my daughter!?”

A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode!
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Animal Web](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)
description.pt-br: Esta é uma comédia romântica estrelada por uma mulher adulta de 30 anos chamada Ayako, que é confessada por um homem 10 anos mais novo dela, o estudante universitário de 20 anos, Takumi … Um homem que ela conhece como o menino "Ta-kun" que mora ao lado e que ensina sua filha adotiva desde os 10 anos. A revelação a espanta, pois ela pensava que sua filha Miu e ele eram um casal.

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

altTitles.ja: ハッピーエンドはご一緒に

altTitles.zh: 只属于我们俩的完美结局

description.en: Company-man Sakuraba makes himself cute lunches every day, reads girls' comics, and generally loves all things feminine. Sakuraba is speechless when he meets his favorite manga artist, Megumi Nono, at a book signing... because it turns out that his idol is actually his neighbor! He goes to visit him a few days later, only to have Megumi collapse, leaving Sakuraba to care for him. And that's how he becomes friends with his neighbor and idol.....! Feminine top Sakuraba sometimes shows remarkable tolerance towards his tough bottom, who suddenly comes over adorably shy. This heartwarming yaoi manga from noted new star Chito Hanakawa will ruffle your feathers with cuteness!!

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.ja: ぬこづけ！

altTitles.th: เรื่องวุ่นๆ กับมนุษย์เหมียวๆ

description.en:
A heartwarming story about the daily lives of a freeter named Yuuya and his two little pets.  
  
Note: Chapters follow the Tankouban (book) order and numbering. The chapter number in (Ex Ch. No.) specifies the original chapter number (when first released on HanaLala Online & MangaPark) before the chapters were compiled into the book.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AC%E3%81%93%E3%81%A5%E3%81%91!)

altTitles.ja: 織田ちゃんと明智くん

description.ja:
本能寺の変から４４２年ーーなんやかんやあって、付き合いました。

学園一の不良・明智隆之介と、学園のアイドル・織田麻里亜。想い合う二人の前世は、かつて裏切り裏切られた明智光秀（と織田信長だった！ 記憶が戻ったことで、再び明智を支配下においた織田は、カップルを装いつつ現世での天下統一を目指すことに…！？
description.es-la: Akechi Ryunosuke, el chico más rebelde de la escuela, y Oda Maria, la idol más querida, jamás imaginaron que sus mundos opuestos podrían unirse. Sin embargo, después de que Akechi confiesa sus sentimientos, comienzan una inesperada relación. Pero durante su primer beso, un impactante recuerdo del incendio del Templo Honnouji invade sus mentes... ¡Comienza así una electrizante vida escolar, donde el amor y el rencor de vidas pasadas se mezclan en una historia apasionante y llena de misterio!

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero: The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

title.en: Kokan Musou ~Kiraware Yuusha wa Mazoku ni Aisareru~

altTitles.ja: 股間無双～嫌われ勇者は魔族に愛される～

altTitles.en: Unparallelled Groin ~The Hated Hero Is Loved By The Demons~

altTitles.zh-hk: 股間無雙～被討厭的勇者卻被魔族所愛～

description.en:
Kantarou, who has ascended to heaven because he is too sick, reincarnates in a different world. Kantarou, who is distorted in character and is a fatty, is disliked even after reincarnating, but notices that a cloudy potion that cures anything from his crotch appears. Moreover, it also has the effect of powering up the demons, and it will be loved by the demons…!? A different world reincarnation fantasy that is unmatched in the crotch!!!
___
**Alt Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/3269754496640214685)
- [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55354)
description.ja: ヌキすぎて昇天してしまった汗太郎(かんたろう)は異世界に転生する。キモデブで性格も歪んでいる汗太郎は転生した先でも嫌われてしまうが、自分の股間から何でも治してしまう白濁色のポーションが出ることに気づく。しかもそれは魔族をパワーアップさせる効果も持っていて、魔族からも求愛されることに……!?股間で無双する異世界転生ファンタジー!!!

altTitles.ja: ノイパちゃんはアブナイ!

description.en: At school, no one seems to care what transfer student Noipa-chan wears. In fact, they don't even seem to notice her existence, except for one person. Yuu is the only one who wonders what's going on with that girl.
description.ja:
ねぇ、アタシのこと…見てた?

男子学生"ユウ"の前に現れた、露出全開な美少女"ノイパ"。彼女は大胆な衣装に身を包んでいるにも関わらず、日常に溶け込み、他の教師や生徒は無反応。
description.es-la: En la escuela, a nadie parece importarle la vestimenta de Noipa-chan, una estudiante transferida. De hecho, ni siquiera parecen notar su existencia, salvo por una persona. Yuu es el único que se pregunta qué sucede con esa chica, y ahora que fue descubierto mirándola, se verá inmiscuido en una situación de peligro.
description.pt-br: Na escola, ninguém parece se importar com o que a estudante transferida Noipa-chan usa. Na verdade, eles nem parecem notar a sua existência, exceto uma pessoa. Yuu é o único que se pergunta o que está acontecendo com aquela garota.

altTitles.ja: 川柳少女

description.en:
Yukishiro Nanako is a cute, cheerful high school girl with one peculiar trait: instead of verbal communication, she writes senryu (a type of haiku) poems to relay her thoughts. Together with ex-delinquent Busujima Eiji, they are budding freshmen of the school's Literature Club.  
  
Even though Nanako doesn't talk, with the power of senryu, the adorable pair has no problem enjoying their fun school-life through the tune of 5-7-5 syllables.  


---
description.ru:
Юкиширо Нанако - милая и весёлая старшеклассница со специфичной чертой в общении: чтобы передать свои мысли, она пишет сэнрю (как хайку). Нанако вместе с бывшим хулиганом Бусуджимой Эйджи становятся новыми членами литературного клуба. И пусть девушка так странно разговаривает, но благодаря силе сэнрю эта прелестная пара без проблем наслаждается школьной жизнью.   
  
[Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/igagarashi)
description.pt-br:
Yukishiro Nanako é uma colegial fofa e alegre com uma característica peculiar: em vez de comunicação verbal, ela escreve poemas senryuu (um tipo de haiku) para transmitir seus pensamentos. Junto com o ex-delinquente Busujima Eiji, eles são calouros iniciantes do Clube de Literatura da escola.

Embora Nanako não fale, com o poder do senryuu, o adorável par não tem problemas em aproveitar sua divertida vida escolar através da melodia de 5-7-5 sílabas.

altTitles.ja: 魔女の空想コスメ

description.en:
Welcome to the “Fantasy Cosmetics” shop where witches create a world full of dreams and magic.

Following a scent trail of flowers lies the “Charme Dresser” cosmetic shop. It is said that it grants wishes of those who visit with the use of “Fantasy Cosmetic” magic…

Drawn by the big hit illustrator meeco, these charming and fantastical cosmetics will make your heart flutter just by looking at them! A full-colour comic and illustration collection featuring short and unique stories of those who visit this store.

Strawberry quartz, Princess Grape extract and love fortune flower buds… adding these last touches to your own “fantasy”, it’s time to prepare your Fantasy Cosmetics.
description.ja:
魔女が生み出す、夢と魔法に満ちた「空想コスメ」ショップへようこそ

花の香りをたどった先にあるコスメショップ「シャルムドレッサー」。
そこには、訪れた人の望みを叶える魔法の「空想コスメ」があるという――

大人気イラストレーターmeecoが描く
見ているだけでときめく魅力的な架空のコスメと、
店に訪れる人たちの個性豊かなエピソードが収録された
オールカラー コミック＆イラスト集。

苺水晶、姫葡萄エキス、恋占いの花つぼみ…
仕上げにあなたの想いが詰まった「空想」を込めて
さあ、空想コスメをつくりましょう。

title.en: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to

altTitles.ja: エルフとバイクと帝国地理調査員と

altTitles.en: Elf and Bike and Imperial Geographic Surveyor and…

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.ja: サクラ大戦 漫画版第二部

description.en: With the Hive of Darkness and High Priest Tenkai defeated, peace has returned to the capital thanks to the Imperial Combat Troupe. But a new enemy has risen and threatens to disturb this new year of peace! The curtain is rising, the bells are ringing and a new battle is about to begin, for the Kouma have been resurrected by their new King: AOI SATAN
description.ja: 黒之巣会との死闘に勝利し平和を取り戻した帝都・東京。だが、新年を祝う花組の眼前に降魔の群れが舞い降りる。地の底から甦った魔族。それを従えし男の名は、葵叉丹!!

altTitles.ja: メッシュ

description.en:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
description.vi:
"Mesh" kể về một phần tuổi niên thiếu của cậu bé cùng tên, biệt danh bắt nguồn từ mái tóc vàng pha bạc đặc trưng. Câu chuyện mở đầu với cảnh Mesh vừa bị xã hội đen hành hung, tình cờ gặp Milon, một họa sĩ chuyên vẽ tranh nhái. Mesh ở lại nhà Milon, và giữa hai người hình thành một mối liên kết kỳ lạ. Mỗi chương là sự kết hợp đầy chất thơ giữa thế giới tội phạm, những khoảnh khắc đời thường yên bình, và nhịp sống sôi động của các nghệ sĩ tại một Paris huyền ảo được Hagio phác họa.

Tác phẩm này được coi là dấu mốc quan trọng trong sự nghiệp của Hagio Moto, đánh dấu sự chuyển mình lớn trong phong cách nghệ thuật của cô. Đây là loạt truyện đầu tiên của cô mang nét vẽ hiện thực hơn, trong khi vẫn giữ được nét mềm mại đặc trưng của dòng shōjo những năm 1970. Câu chuyện khai thác các chủ đề trưởng thành hơn trước, đồng thời tiếp tục đào sâu những motif quen thuộc trong sáng tác của Hagio, như mối quan hệ cha mẹ - con cái và các vấn đề tâm lý tuổi trẻ.

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)
description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)

altTitles.ja: 赤ずきんちゃん

title.ja: Onimotsu to Yobareta Tensei Hime wa, Shoukan Yuusha ni Koi wo Shite Seijo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: お荷物と呼ばれた転生姫は、召喚勇者に恋をして聖女になりました

altTitles.en: Reborn as the Princess Known as a Burden, I Fell in Love With the Hero and Became the Saint
Reborn as the Princess Known as a Burden, I Fell in Love With the Hero and Became the Saintess

description.en:
A sickly girl is reincarnated in another world as a princess. However, she is looked down on as she does not possess any type of magic. Her purification ability awakens just in time a hero is summoned from another world. Feeling needed for the first time, she starts to fall in love with him... but, for some reason his attitude seems cold?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://www.pixiv.net/novel/series/1234739)
description.ja:
聖女と勇者のキスが、世界を救う鍵！？

魔法が絶対の王国で、魔力のない姫に転生してしまい、日陰で暮らしていたレイア。
しかし、伝説の聖女と同じ浄化の力があると分かり、最強の召喚勇者・カズヤの助けになるように請われて帝国に向かう事に。誰かの役に立てる事を喜ぶレイアだったけど、勇者はどこかレイアによそよそしくて…？
不遇の聖女×最強勇者の世界を救う恋の話。

---
[Original Web Novel](https://www.pixiv.net/novel/series/1234739)

altTitles.ja: メイドさんは吸血鬼

description.en: 15-year-old Alfred Saionji, heir to the venerable Saionji family, spends his days striving to become a first-class gentleman while enduring strict family rules. His solace comes from his maid, Magly. Thanks to her, a cool and beautiful maid, Alfred's life has become colorful, but... In fact, her true identity is a vampire. Once she sees or sucks blood, her very naughty nature comes out, and Alfred immediately has his blood sucked at her command...
description.ja: 由緒正しき西園寺家の跡取りである15歳の西園寺アルフレッドは、厳しい家訓に耐えながらも“一流の立派な男・紳士”になるべく毎日を過ごしていた。そんな彼の癒しは彼付きのメイドのマグリー。クールな美少女メイドである彼女のおかげでアルフレッドの生活は彩りのあるものになっていたが…。実はマグリーの正体は吸血鬼。ひとたび血を見たり吸ったりしてしまうと、すごくHな本性が顔を出し、たちまちアルフレッドは彼女の言いなりに血を吸われてしまうのだった…。だが、この世界では本当は吸血鬼と人間は“相容れぬ存在”であり…。

altTitles.ja: コロニカの脳

description.en: Zero grew up in an orphanage. Contrary to the orphanage's philosophy of "If you want it, believe in and fight for it," Zero hates competition and conflict and prefers peaceful days. However, after discovering a certain secret, Zero finds himself caught up in the whirlpool of a cruel fate...!?

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

altTitles.ja: 水姫先輩の恋占い

description.en:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

altTitles.es-la: Convertí a my amigo de la infancia (♂) en una chica

altTitles.id: Gue Ubah Teman Masa Kecil (♂) Gue Jadi Cewek

altTitles.en: I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend (♂) Into a Girl
How to Make a "Girl" Fall in Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi (♂) wo Onnanoko ni Shiteshimatta Hanashi

altTitles.pt-br: Transformei meu amigo de infância (♂) em uma garota

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染（♂）を女の子にしてしまった話
恋する（おとめ）の作り方

altTitles.en: I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend Into a Girl

altTitles.th: เมคอัปรักเสกนายให้สวยปิ๊ง

description.en: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
description.id: Seorang siswa SMA yang populer diam-diam suka dunia kosmetik, dan meminta teman masa kecilnya yang dekil untuk latihan dandan… tapi, teman masa kecilnya malah jadi imut!?
description.es-la: Un muchacho popular que en secreto está interesado en cosméticos le pide a su amigo simplón dejarlo maquillarle para practicar… ¿¡Y termina viéndose bello(a)!?
description.pt-br: Um garoto popular que está secretamente interessado em cosméticos pede para praticar maquiagem em seu amigo de infância … e ele acaba ficando uma Linda Garota ?!

title.en: BanG Dream! - AnoSoyo Are Already Dating (Doujinshi)
Hell Mode ~Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru~

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market. Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds. All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

altTitles.ja: 放課後の拷問少女

altTitles.vi: Câu Lạc Bộ Tra Tấn Của Các Nữ Sinh Sau Giờ Học

description.en:
After years of being unlucky with girls, Ishimaru Daito only wishes to enjoy his high school life with a normal, cute girlfriend. However, after losing a game to his two new seniors Sasahara Kiyoka and Tomochika Asami, he is forced to join the <Humanism Studies> club which is actually a torture studies club. Will Ishimaru get the normal high school life he always wanted?  
  


---
description.pt: Depois de anos de azar com as garotas, Ishimaru Daito só quer aproveitar a vida no colegial com uma namorada normal e bonita. No entanto, depois de perder um jogo contra suas duas novas senpais, Sasahara Kiyoka e Tomochika Asami, ele é forçado a ingressar no clube de "estudos humanísticos", que na verdade é um clube de estudos sobre tortura. Ishimaru será capaz de alcançar a vida normal do ensino médio que ele sempre quis?
description.vi: Sau nhiều năm đen đủi với các cô gái, Ishimaru Daito chỉ mong được tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung của mình bên một cô bạn gái bình thường và dễ thương. Tuy nhiên, sau khi thua một trò chơi trước hai tiền bối mới của mình là Sasahara Kiyoka và Tomochika Asami, cậu buộc phải tham gia câu lạc bộ <Nghiên Cứu Chủ Nghĩa Nhân Văn> thực chất lại là một câu lạc bộ Nghiên Cứu Tra Tấn. Liệu Ishimaru có được cuộc sống cao trung bình thường mà cậu hằng mong muốn?
description.pt-br: Depois de anos de azar com as garotas, Ishimaru Daito só quer aproveitar a vida no colegial com uma namorada normal e bonita. No entanto, depois de perder um jogo contra suas duas novas senpais, Sasahara Kiyoka e Tomochika Asami, ele é forçado a ingressar no clube de “estudos humanísticos”, que na verdade é um clube de estudos sobre tortura. Ishimaru será capaz de alcançar a vida normal do ensino médio que ele sempre quis?

altTitles.ja: 機動絶記ガンダム SEQUEL

altTitles.vi: Cơ Động Tuyệt Kí Gundam Sequel

description.en: It has been 700 years since a certain "war" in which more than half of the human race lost their lives. The Gundam, which had protected the Earth during the Great War, was no longer necessary for humankind. In such a peaceful world, there was a woman called "Bloody Kaoris". This is a story of betrayal over the lost "God" named "Gundam".

title.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!

altTitles.ja: 陰キャの僕に罰ゲームで告白してきたはずのギャルが、どう見ても僕にベタ惚れです

altTitles.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!
The Gal Who Was Meant to Confess to Me as a Punishment Game Has Apparently Fallen in Love with Me

altTitles.zh-hk: 因懲罰遊戲才向陰角的我告白的辣妹，怎麼看都已經完全迷戀上我了

altTitles.ko: 아싸인 내게 벌칙 게임으로 고백해 온 갸루가 아무리 봐도 나한테 반한 것 같다

altTitles.ru: Девушка, которая должна была признаться мне в качестве игрового наказания, очевидно, влюбилась в меня

altTitles.pl: Introwertyczne wpadki podrywowe: Ta Gyaru zakochała się we mnie po uszy!
Gal, która miała mi wyznać miłość w ramach gry z karą, najwyraźniej się we mnie zakochała.

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya no Boku ni Batsu Game ni Kokuhaku Shitekita Hazu no Gyaru ga, Doumitemo Boku ni Betahore Desu

altTitles.vi: Nhỏ Gyaru lẽ ra tỏ tình với người u ám như tôi chỉ vì trò chơi trừng phạt, nhưng dù có nhìn kiểu gì thì cổ cũng yêu tôi mà!

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pl: Kiedy piękna Nanami Barato wyznaje miłość Yoshinowi Misumai, wydaje się to zbyt piękne, by mogło być prawdziwe! Tylko, że tak jest - i Yoshin o tym wie. Jak taki introwertyczny facet jak on ma zachować zimną krew, skoro wie, że to tylko wyzwanie? Jeszcze bardziej zastanawiające jest to, że pomimo jej krzykliwego wyglądu, ta rzekoma gyaru nie jest tak dobra w kontaktach z facetami! Być może jest to idealna okazja dla tego nieśmiałego faceta, aby zebrać się na odwagę i powiedzieć "tak" tej nieśmiałej dziewczynie. Tak zaczyna się ich nowe, wygodne życie porannych spotkań i ręcznie robionych lunchów. Rzecz w tym, że sądząc po jej zachowaniu, Nanami zakochała się w nim po uszy! Czy ta dwójka może odkryć swoje uczucia, a może nawet zakochać się w sobie - tym razem naprawdę?!
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho
Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.it: Le 100 fidanzate che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
description.ja: 人生で自分にとっての「一番」をずっと心にしまい続けながら、チョコレート工場での仕事を続ける一好瑛太。クリスマスの夜、帰宅中の彼は暗闇から転がる不思議なスーパーボールを手にする。日常への様々な思いをぶつけるように、そのボールを思い切り投げつけた彼の前にいきなり現れたのは理想の「美女」．．．！？
description.pt-br: Ichiyoshi continua trabalhando em uma fábrica de chocolate, trancando o seu "melhor" em seu coração. Numa noite de Natal, a caminho de casa, ele encontra uma misteriosa super bola que  cai da escuridão...

altTitles.ja: 平成敗残兵☆すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Let's stay tuned!
description.ja: 元・売れないアイドル、現・プータローの『すみれちゃん』31歳。芸能界の熾烈な競争に敗北し、カラダもココロもボコられた彼女は、とりあえずボロアパートでゴロゴロする日々を過ごしていた。そんな彼女に目をつけた従兄弟の高校1年生『ゆうせい』が、とある儲け話を持ちかける。「カラダはいいんだから同人グラビア写真集出そうよ」。果たしてすみれちゃんは令和の世でリベンジをかませるのか！乞うご期待！

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Saiai no Onee-sama ga Akuyaku Reijou datta no de, Kami ga Sadameta Scenario ni Aragaimasu @COMIC

altTitles.ja: 最愛のお姉様が悪役令嬢だったので、神が定めた運命（シナリオ）に抗います@COMIC

altTitles.zh: 最爱的姐姐是恶役千金、哪怕是神所定下的命运我也扭转给你看

altTitles.en: I'll Fight against the Villain's Fate That the Gods Have Ordained for My Beloved Sister! @comic

description.en:
"I will defeat the destiny that stands in my sister's way!"

The younger sister adores her older sister, the villainess, from the bottom of her heart. Without caring about how it may look, she stands up against her sister's bad end! 

An energetic loop fantasy that spans time with only love and persistence!

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: 継母の心得

description.en:
Yamazaki Misaki passed away due to illness, but when she awoke, she found that she had been reborn as a character in a manga she had read before her death — the abusive, wicked stepmother of the young protagonist.  

Only remembering this the day before her wedding, there was already no way to escape. Determined to treat her stepson well, upon meeting him, she found the boy extremely adorable! 

As she worked to raise the child well with her memories to aid her, the attitude of her cold husband began to change?!
description.ja: 病気でこの世を去ることになった山崎美咲。ところが目を覚ますと、生前読んでいたマンガの世界に転生していた。しかも、幼少期の主人公を虐待する悪辣な継母キャラとして……。前世の記憶を取り戻したのは結婚式の前日で、もはや逃げようもない。とにかく虐待しないようにしよう、と決意して対面した継子は――めちゃくちゃ可愛いんですけどー!!!　ついつい前世の知識を駆使して子育てに奮闘しているうちに、超絶冷たかった旦那様の態度も変わってきて……!?　義息子のためならチートにもなっちゃう！　愛とオタクの力で異世界の育児事情を変える、異色の子育てファンタジー、開幕！

altTitles.ja: 星刻の竜騎士

description.en:
Welcome to Ansullivan Dragonar Academy, a school with a difference: the students are dragon riders, each contracted with their own personal dragon. Ash Blake has the unique ability to ride anyone's dragon, but he's been waiting for what feels like forever for his own dragon to be born. He's thrilled when his dragon, Eco, finally appears–but she inexplicably takes the form of a beautiful human girl.  
  
Eco's peculiar appearance is only the first unusual thing Ash faces. His life is about to become a whirlwind of spies, dragon races, and unexpected attention from both the proud Princess Sylvia and the beautiful president of the student council, Rebecca. All Ash wants is to acclimate Eco to the world, but someone out there wants his strange dragon on the dissecting table!

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Uma Musumeshi

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘プリティーダービーうまむすめし

description.en: "In their daily lives, as well as their special moments, Uma Musume enjoy eating "tasty dishes"♪"?

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

altTitles.ja: カッコいい女の子と12センチの約束

altTitles.ja-ro: Kakkoi Onnanoko to 12 cm no Yakusoku

altTitles.en: A Cool Girl and a 12cm Promise

altTitles.es-la: Una chica genial y una promesa de 12 cm

altTitles.vi: Lời hứa 12cm với cô gái ngầu lòi

description.en:
Tomoaki Kamba admired his boyish childhood friend, Ibuki Tachibana, and promised to become "more cool" than her.

However, four years have passed, and Ibuki has grown up to be an even more handsome girl! Their relationship is as unchanged as a 12cm height difference that cannot be filled...?

The curtain rises on a pure love story about a cool girl who is sorely in love with a boy who wants to be cool!

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.
description.ja:
椛 智明(かんば ともあき)はボーイッシュな幼なじみ、立華 一颯(たちばな いぶき)に憧れ、彼女より「もっとカッコよくなる」と約束をする。

しかし４年が経ち、一颯はさらに超イケメン女子に成長!! 二人の関係は埋まらない12センチの身長差と同じく、変わらない…？

カッコいい女の子が、カッコよくなりたい男の子にきゅんとするピュアなラブストーリーの幕開け━━。
